title: Cajun blackened salmon with fresh sweetcorn salsa
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons dried ground thyme', '2 tablespoons dried ground oregano', '2 tablespoons dried ground coriander', '1 tablespoon dried ground cumin', '4 tablespoons sweet paprika', '1 tablespoon hot paprika', '4 fresh skinless salmon fillets (approx 150-250g each)', 'olive oil', '500g fresh sweetcorn (on cobs)', '2 large red peppers', '2 medium red onions', '1 bunch fresh coriander, finely chopped', '3 fresh limes']
